      • create

        public static Connection create(java.lang.String className,
                ConnectionInformation connectionInformation)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Find a driver and create a new connection
        Parameters:
        className - the connection class name to pre-load
        connectionInformation - The connection information
        Returns:
        The new connection or null if no driver can be found
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - the provided connection class cannot be found
